title: Danny McBride
description:
On this week’s episode Kevin is joined by actor and writer Danny McBride. They discuss topics such as his hit HBO show The Righteous Gemstones, why he prefers to play the part of the anti-hero in most of his projects, how he feels about critics, and why he chose to move to Charleston from Hollywood.

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Danny McBride, Kevin Hart)
